text:
The proposed mask is a BAD MASK due to the
tiny spot next to it. Maize kernel masks
should consist of only one part.
 Whithout the spot, the mask would be good.

GOOD MASK. The kernel is well developed,
although its surface has probably
been damaged after harvest.

The proposed mask is a BAD MASK. Two kernels
 are covererd by a single mask.

The proposed mask is a BAD MASK. The kernel
 is wrinkly and not well developed.

GOOD MASK. Even though the kernel is small,
it's not wrinkly.

GOOD MASK. Even though the kernel is small,
it's not wrinkly.

GOOD MASK. As long as individual kernels are
possible to be recognised, they should
be annotated even at the edges od the ear.

GOOD MASK. Normal fully developed kernel, depicted by correct
mask consisting of only one part.

 NOTE: Later you will be asked to draw polygon masks.
Regarding contour quality, take these masks as examples.
